column1: #text=For my english class , I had to read a book about President Obama .
#text=Normally , I am able to find a pdf copy of a book online but I could n't find this book .
#text=I had no choice but to go to the library to take out this book .
#text=While I was at the library , I had to wait on line to speak to the librarian .
#text=I wanted the librarian to help me find the book since the library was a huge library .
#text=I would n't be able to find the book on my own .
#text=When I was finally able to speak to the librarian about the book , she was very warm and helpful .
#text=Not only did she tell me where the book was at but she personally walked with me to the area .
#text=On the way , she made small talk and asked why am I reading the book ?
#text=I told her it was for an english class .
#text=A minute later , we came to the area where the book was located .
#text=She picked up the book and handed it to me .
#text=Soon , she helped me check out the book .
#text=Finally , I had the book and I left the library .
